title: [Sylvarraend, Glade]
description: A sense of serenity blankets the glade, undisturbed by the drifting breeze that dances around the surrounding trees.  In the distance, Sylvarraend is merely a collection of pinpoints of light in the tranquil darkness.  Cast in cool moonlight, twelve white stones encircle a pale limestone altar that houses the occasional tribute to this shrine celebrating the quiet beauty of nature.

A sense of serenity blankets the glade, undisturbed by the drifting breeze that dances around the surrounding trees.  Lush grass is spotted by the occasional wildflower, a florid island amidst an ocean of green.  Twelve white stones encircle a pale limestone altar that houses the occasional tribute to this shrine celebrating the quiet beauty of nature.
